name: Astrosmack
description: Astrosmack is a clone of "Astrosmash," which was a game that was popular on the Intellivision game console of the early 1980s.  The objective is simple: Earth is being bombarded by asteroids and various enemies, and your goal is to shoot them all!  Features music, sound effects, customization, keyboard/joystick control, and high score tracking.
